Hi Tom, thanks for that, I have the description sorted ( though I am 
uncle=
ar if that is what this paper says ) but it appears to be a Double 
nestled=
 Mokko in Ji Sukashi, thanks to the NCJSC mag ( issue June 2004, 
Plate 97/=
194 ) and the T=F4ban Shinpin Zukan ( plate 97/194 )  I also have 
put up a=

ers.westnet.com.au/whiz/richard/pics/tsuba/akao1.jpg

Jidai that I don't have,=
 and row 6, the level of the paper.

Cheers

Rich
